sentences.en: The town raised a memorial to those killed in the war.
sentences.cn: 这座小镇为战争中牺牲的人树立了一座纪念碑。

sentences.en: Building a memorial to Columbus has been his lifelong dream.

sentences.en: The painting will be a lasting memorial to a remarkable woman.
